review: Dr. Lall is a wonderful Doctor....Did a very clean and excellent job on my teeth. There was hardly any pain.... **** *** **** ****** *** *** ****** **** **********. Thanks to Him...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Reshaping,Painful Teething,
review:
Hi,

I was trying to connect with Dr. Adosh Lall for a long time, but being failed due to some technical reason. 

Luckily, I received a call like a gift from Dr. Adosh to visit @ Apollo on 01/28/2020. I was suffering from multiple issues with my teeth. 

Before sharing  the feedback, one word to say, what a TREMENDOUS PERSONALITY DR ADOSH.  I just forgot everything by hearing his voice and polite way of talking.

Next day when I visited the hospital, he welcome with a grand happiness and elaborated each issues bit by bit without any hurry leaving huge smile on my face.  I was feeling like cureness has already begun without starting the treatment.

I salute his utmost level of treatment......his commitment and assurance regarding the action plan, i.e completely awesome. 

I had connected with him around 40 minutes,  he was continuously trying to encouraging me and  building the trust. He was too friendly.
He is a great human being  gifted by smile and always sharing the same to all.

Treatment point of view, ** ** *** **** *** ************ Once meet him and bring your smile back....

Thank You
Nutan Jha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dental Clinic  and Doctor way of treatinting is excellent in all respect. 100% Complete satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr is very friendly n caring ....his hands are gentle while he treats ,makes u feel comfortable and in safe hands.
The best part is that he follows up to ask u how u are feeling the next day.
I have got implants n capping done from him too.
I visit him n only him from 20 miles
I would recommend this doctor to everyone....
Wish him the bedt.
God bless....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Its been more than 20 years that i am visiting to Dr Adhosh lall as i always got my treatment in a streamlined satisfactory way without any hastle. His way of explanation and practical thought process give comfort to his patients who doesn‚Äôt get any second thoughts pf not having a treatment. His work is impeccable and highly recommendable.

Thank you Dr Adhosh Lall to help people smile again. üòÅ
